articles.title: 'We were not aware of drink driving charge': Mediacorp cuts ties with Shane Pow - AsiaOne
articles.description: While its artistes have run afoul of the law before, Mediacorp has stuck by them. But now, it seems its patience has run out. At 1pm today (Apr 26), local broadcaster Mediacorp — which owns the talent management agency The Celebrity Agency — released a statem…
articles.content:

articles.author: Matthew Mohan
articles.title: Singaporean fencer Amita Berthier earns Olympic spot after winning qualification tournament - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Amita Berthier has booked her place at this year's Olympic Games, after winning the women's foil event at the Asia-Oceanian Olympic Qualification Tournament in Tashkent, Uzbekistan on Sunday (Apr 25).
